personalInfo.name: Ekansh Bajpai
personalInfo.title: Master's Student at University of Paderborn
personalInfo.about: Robotics, AI/ML, and Full-Stack Engineer specializing in autonomous systems, SLAM, neuromorphic computing, RAG/GraphRAG AI platforms, and scalable end-to-end solutions, with expertise spanning embedded systems, signal processing, neural networks, and cloud-native applications, currently pursuing an M.Sc. in Electrical Systems Engineering and seeking research-driven, deployable technology opportunities.

education.degree: Master of Science in Electrical Systems Engineering
education.focus: Signal & Information Processing, SLAM, Neural Networks, CNN, SNN

education.degree: Bachelor of Technology in Electronics and Communications Engineering
education.institution: Madan Mohan Malaviya University of Technology

experience.description: Assisted in developing full-stack and AI/ML solutions, including AI-powered chatbots, and regulatory compliance platforms. Contributed to backend and frontend services, semantic search pipelines, and RAG/GraphRAG pipelines, gaining hands-on experience with FastAPI, LangChain, FAISS, RAG, Graph/Vector databases
highlights: Developed backend microservices and APIs for scalable applications
Built AI-powered chatbots with context-aware responses
Implemented semantic search using vector databases (FAISS)
Created real-time dashboards for monitoring IoT data
Designed predictive maintenance algorithms for large datasets
Contributed to RAG pipelines for intelligent knowledge retrieval

experience.description: Worked on the Collana collation tool within a National Research Data Infrastructure project for cultural heritage, focusing on redesigning and extending the frontend with new features.
highlights: Designed and implemented a new version of the Collana collation tool
Added new features to support cultural data collation workflows
Improved UI consistency and usability using Angular Material
Collaborated in a distributed, research-oriented development team

projects.title: Normex ‚Äì Regulatory Compliance Platform
projects.description: AI-powered platform for regulatory compliance monitoring, document analysis, and policy verification using Generative AI and RAG architecture. Built microservices-based backend with vector database integration for semantic search.
features: Document ingestion pipeline with batch processing
Semantic search using ChromaDB vector store
AI-powered compliance chatbot with RAG
Automated reporting and role-based access control
Deployed on AWS with Docker containerization

projects.title: ASEC Backend ‚Äì AI-Assisted Compliance Platform
projects.description: Secure, API-centric backend for Automotive SPICE‚Äìaligned systems engineering, providing project and document management, traceability, and LLM-powered compliance analysis using RAG over official guidelines.
features: JWT-based authentication with refresh tokens
Project-centric document and analysis management
Rule-driven document classification and validation
LLM-powered analysis (document, base practice, process assessment)
RAG pipeline over ISO / A-SPICE guidelines
End-to-end traceability across projects, work products, and analyses
Containerized, modular backend architecture

projects.title: sIEMi ‚Äì Knowledge Management System
projects.description: AI-driven knowledge management system that captures, structures, and retrieves organizational knowledge using a graph database and NLP-powered analysis of employee responses.
features: Automated knowledge capture via team-focused questions
NLP analysis and decomposition of answers into structured knowledge units (problem, context, solution, systems, documents, person)
Graph-based knowledge storage with nodes and edges
Intelligent retrieval of solutions and relevant experts for new queries
Dynamic knowledge map showing 'who knows what' and 'how problems were solved'

projects.title: Nexus AI ‚Äì Generative AI Platform
projects.description: LLM-powered systems for conversational AI and enterprise knowledge management, combining intent classification, RAG pipelines, hybrid search, and prompt optimization for high-quality automated responses.
features: Conversational chatbot interface with context awareness
Intent classification and entity extraction
RAG pipeline for knowledge retrieval and document embeddings
Hybrid search with semantic and keyword support
Response caching and performance optimization
Prompt engineering, tuning, and continuous evaluation
Multi-user support with access controls

projects.title: NFDI4Culture ‚Äì Collana Collation Tool
projects.description: Contributed to a National Research Data Infrastructure sub-project for cultural heritage by redesigning and extending the Collana collation tool with new functionality and improved UI using Angular-based technologies.
features: Redesigned and implemented a new version of the Collana collation tool
Added new frontend features for cultural data collation workflows
Improved usability and maintainability of the existing codebase
Collaborated within a research-driven, distributed team

experience.description: Internship focused on embedded communication systems for a carrier robot, implementing standard protocols for reliable sensor data transfer on Arduino-based hardware.
highlights: Implemented I2C, and SPI communication protocols
Designed a master/slave system for ESP32/Arduino Nano devices
Designed rules for reliable sensor data transfer
Integrated communication logic on Arduino hardware
Supported robotics system development and testing

projects.title: Neuromorphic Event-Based SLAM (In Progress)
projects.role: Master's Thesis Student | University of Paderborn
projects.description: Designing a spiking neural network (SNN) based patch selector for event-based visual odometry, replacing CNN-based dense processing with asynchronous neuromorphic computation. Extension of VO pipeline into full SLAM system with pose-graph optimization.
features: SNN front-end integration with DEVO pipeline
Pose-graph optimization for long-term drift correction
Loop closure detection implementation
Benchmarking on MVSEC and EVIMO2 datasets
Analysis of latency, accuracy under high-speed & HDR conditions

projects.title: Master's Project | Autonomous Mapping & SLAM Optimization
projects.description: Enhanced LOAM-based SLAM pipeline with IMU pose estimation. Implemented templated C++ architecture for multiple graph optimization backends, integrating g2o and SE-Sync libraries with comprehensive benchmarking.
features: Modular ROS packages with single-responsibility design
Templated C++ architecture for optimizer backends
Integration and benchmarking of g2o and SE-Sync
Wrapper ROS nodes for graph optimization testing
YAML-based parameter and configuration management

projects.title: Visual-Inertial Odometry System
projects.description: Developed robust Visual-Inertial Odometry system combining camera and IMU data for accurate pose estimation.
features: Feature extraction and optical flow tracking
IMU calibration and preintegration
Real-time pose estimation pipeline
Evaluation on EuRoC and TUM datasets

projects.title: Cellgo
projects.description: Developed low-level communication logic for a carrier robot by implementing standard embedded communication protocols to reliably transfer sensor data on an Arduino-based platform.
features: Implemented I2C, and SPI communication protocols
Designed a master/slave system for ESP32/Arduino Nano devices
Designed rules for reliable sensor data transfer
Integrated communication logic on Arduino hardware
Supported robotics system development and testing

projects.title: Custom OLED Ping Pong Game with Facial Avatars
projects.description: Designed and built an interactive OLED-based ping pong game running on a custom PCB with personalized player avatars, integrating image processing, embedded graphics rendering, and microcontroller-based gameplay logic.
features: Custom ping pong gameplay on 128x64 OLED display
Face-to-bitmap conversion and rendering on microcontroller displays
Custom PCB design integrating NodeMCU, buttons, and OLED module
Two-button player control and simple AI opponent logic
Real-time game physics, scoring, and difficulty scaling
Embedded graphical rendering using display libraries

projects.title: Bachelor's Thesis | Self Balancing Object Tracking Robot
projects.role: Bachelor's Thesis Student | Madan Mohan Malaviya University of Technology
projects.description: Designed and implemented a two-wheeled self-balancing robot that combines PID-based inverted pendulum control with IMU sensor fusion and Raspberry Pi‚Äìbased computer vision to autonomously track and follow objects in real time.
features: PID-controlled self-balancing using IMU sensor fusion (MPU6050)
Real-time tilt estimation and motor feedback control
Vision-based object detection and centroid tracking with OpenCV
Autonomous motion control based on visual feedback
Camera-based color segmentation and contour analysis
End-to-end integration of control, sensing, and vision modules

experience.description: Application migration and production support in cloud environments.
highlights: Migrated applications from OCP stack to GKE cloud
Handled support tasks and ticket resolution for the NGP team

experience.description: Full-stack web development on AWS and web platforms using ReactJS/AngularJS.

Participated in client requirement discussions and feasibility analysis
Worked on fintech applications including loan platforms with cryptocurrency collateral

projects.title: MoneyWorld Asia ‚Äì Money Remit System
projects.description: Money transfer system supporting multiple currencies.
features: Customer and Back Office web applications built with React JS
Backend developed using multiple AWS services
Report generation using JasperReports
Third-party API integration for user data

projects.title: eTutorWorld
projects.description: Online tutoring and test preparation platform.
features: Student portal development
Admin portal development
Backend development using AWS services

projects.title: KRYPTOFIN
projects.description: Loan management solution with cryptocurrency as collateral.
features: Backend development for Android and iOS applications
AWS-based service integration

projects.title: STEELMINT
projects.description: Information platform for the iron and steel industry.
features: Web UI development for industry data
Display of commodity prices, tenders, and events

projects.description: Web portal to increase student interaction during college techfest.

Built-in web chat functionality
